Am<S>1510</S> I not<S>3756</S> an apostle<S>652</S>? am<S>1510</S> I not<S>3756</S> free<S>1658</S>? have I not<S>3780</S> seen<S>3708</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>? are<S>2075</S> not<S>3756</S> ye<S>5210</S> my<S>3450</S> work<S>2041</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>?
If<S>1487</S> I be<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> an apostle<S>652</S> unto others<S>243</S>, yet<S>235</S> doubtless<S>1065</S> I am<S>1510</S> to you<S>5213</S>: for<S>1063</S> the seal<S>4973</S> of mine<S>1699</S> apostleship<S>651</S> are<S>2075</S> ye<S>5210</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Mine<S>1699</S> answer<S>627</S> to them that do examine<S>350</S> me<S>1691</S> is<S>2076</S> this<S>3778</S>,
Have we<S>2192</S> not<S>3378</S> power<S>1849</S> to eat<S>5315</S> and<S>2532</S> to drink<S>4095</S>?
Have we<S>2192</S> not<S>3378</S> power<S>1849</S> to lead about<S>4013</S> a sister<S>79</S>, a wife<S>1135</S>, as well as<S>5613</S> <S>2532</S> other<S>3062</S> apostles<S>652</S>, and<S>2532</S> as the brethren<S>80</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> Cephas<S>2786</S>? <sup>wife: or, woman</sup>
Or<S>2228</S> I<S>1473</S> only<S>3441</S> and<S>2532</S> Barnabas<S>921</S>, have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> we<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> to forbear<S>3361</S> working<S>2038</S>?
Who<S>5101</S> goeth a warfare<S>4754</S> any time at<S>4218</S> his own<S>2398</S> charges<S>3800</S>? who<S>5101</S> planteth<S>5452</S> a vineyard<S>290</S>, and<S>2532</S> eateth<S>2068</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> the fruit<S>2590</S> thereof<S>846</S>? or<S>2228</S> who<S>5101</S> feedeth<S>4165</S> a flock<S>4167</S>, and<S>2532</S> eateth<S>2068</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> the milk<S>1051</S> of the flock<S>4167</S>?
Say I<S>2980</S> these things<S>5023</S> as<S>3361</S> <S>2596</S> a man<S>444</S>? or<S>2228</S> saith<S>3004</S> not<S>3780</S> the law<S>3551</S> the same<S>5023</S> also<S>2532</S>?
For<S>1063</S> it is written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S> of Moses<S>3475</S>, Thou shalt<S>5392</S> not<S>3756</S> muzzle<S>5392</S> the mouth of the ox<S>1016</S> that treadeth out the corn<S>248</S>.<S>3361</S> Doth<S>3199</S> God<S>2316</S> take care<S>3199</S> for oxen<S>1016</S>?
Or<S>2228</S> saith he<S>3004</S> it altogether<S>3843</S> for<S>1223</S> our<S>2248</S> sakes<S>1223</S>? For<S>1223</S> our<S>2248</S> sakes<S>1223</S>, no doubt<S>1063</S>, this is written<S>1125</S>: that<S>3754</S> he that ploweth<S>722</S> should<S>3784</S> plow<S>722</S> in<S>1909</S> hope<S>1680</S>; and<S>2532</S> that he that thresheth<S>248</S> in hope<S>1680</S> should be partaker<S>3348</S> of<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> hope<S>1680</S>.
If<S>1487</S> we<S>2249</S> have sown<S>4687</S> unto you<S>5213</S> spiritual things<S>4152</S>, is it a great thing<S>3173</S> if<S>1487</S> we<S>2249</S> shall reap<S>2325</S> your<S>5216</S> carnal things<S>4559</S>?
If<S>1487</S> others<S>243</S> be partakers<S>3348</S> of this power<S>1849</S> over you<S>5216</S>, are not<S>3756</S> we<S>2249</S> rather<S>3123</S>? Nevertheless<S>235</S> we have<S>5530</S> not<S>3756</S> used<S>5530</S> this<S>5026</S> power<S>1849</S>; but<S>235</S> suffer<S>4722</S> all things<S>3956</S>, lest<S>3363</S> we should<S>1325</S> <S>5100</S> hinder<S>1464</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
Do ye<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> they which minister<S>2038</S> about holy things<S>2413</S> live<S>2068</S> of the things of<S>1537</S> the temple<S>2411</S>? and they which wait<S>4332</S> at the altar<S>2379</S> are partakers<S>4829</S> with the altar<S>2379</S>? <sup>live: or, feed</sup>
Even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> hath<S>1299</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> ordained<S>1299</S> that they which preach<S>2605</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> should live<S>2198</S> of<S>1537</S> the gospel<S>2098</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> have used<S>5530</S> none<S>3762</S> of these things<S>5130</S>:<S>1161</S> neither<S>3756</S> have I written<S>1125</S> these things<S>5023</S>, that<S>2443</S> it should be<S>1096</S> so<S>3779</S> done<S>1096</S> unto<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>: for<S>1063</S> it were better<S>3123</S> for me<S>3427</S> to die<S>599</S> <S>2570</S>, than<S>2228</S> that<S>2443</S> any man<S>5100</S> should make<S>2758</S> my<S>3450</S> glorying<S>2745</S> void<S>2758</S>.
For<S>1063</S> though<S>1437</S> I preach the gospel<S>2097</S>, I<S>3427</S> have<S>2076</S> nothing<S>3756</S> to glory of<S>2745</S>: for<S>1063</S> necessity<S>318</S> is laid upon<S>1945</S> me<S>3427</S>; yea<S>1161</S>, woe<S>3759</S> is<S>2076</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, if<S>3362</S> I preach<S>2097</S> not<S>3362</S> the gospel<S>2097</S>!
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> I do<S>4238</S> this thing<S>5124</S> willingly<S>1635</S>, I have<S>2192</S> a reward<S>3408</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> against my will<S>210</S>, a dispensation<S>3622</S> of the gospel is committed unto me<S>4100</S>.
What<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3427</S> reward<S>3408</S> then<S>3767</S>? Verily that<S>2443</S>, when I preach the gospel<S>2097</S>, I may make<S>5087</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> without charge<S>77</S>, that<S>1519</S> I abuse<S>2710</S> not<S>3361</S> my<S>3450</S> power<S>1849</S> in<S>1722</S> the gospel<S>2098</S>.
For<S>1063</S> though I be<S>5607</S> free<S>1658</S> from<S>1537</S> all<S>3956</S> men, yet have I made<S>1402</S> myself<S>1683</S> servant<S>1402</S> unto all<S>3956</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might gain<S>2770</S> the more<S>4119</S>.
And<S>2532</S> unto the Jews<S>2453</S> I became<S>1096</S> as<S>5613</S> a Jew<S>2453</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might gain<S>2770</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>; to them that are under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>, as<S>5613</S> under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might gain<S>2770</S> them that are under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>;
To them that are without law<S>459</S>, as<S>5613</S> without law<S>459</S>, (being<S>5607</S> not<S>3361</S> without law<S>459</S> to God<S>2316</S>, but<S>235</S> under the law<S>1772</S> to Christ<S>5547</S>,) that<S>2443</S> I might gain<S>2770</S> them that are without law<S>459</S>.
To the weak<S>772</S> became I<S>1096</S> as<S>5613</S> weak<S>772</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might gain<S>2770</S> the weak<S>772</S>: I am made<S>1096</S> all things<S>3956</S> to all<S>3956</S> men, that<S>2443</S> I might<S>4982</S> by all means<S>3843</S> save<S>4982</S> some<S>5100</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> I do<S>4160</S> for<S>1223</S> the gospel's<S>2098</S> sake<S>1223</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might be<S>1096</S> partaker<S>4791</S> thereof<S>846</S> with<S>4791</S> you.
Know ye<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> they which run<S>5143</S> in<S>1722</S> a race<S>4712</S> run<S>5143</S> all<S>3956</S> <S>3303</S>, but<S>1161</S> one<S>1520</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> the prize<S>1017</S>? So<S>3779</S> run<S>5143</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye may obtain<S>2638</S>.
And<S>1161</S> every man<S>3956</S> that striveth for the mastery<S>75</S> is temperate<S>1467</S> in all things<S>3956</S>.<S>3303</S> Now<S>3767</S> they<S>1565</S> do it to<S>2443</S> obtain<S>2983</S> a corruptible<S>5349</S> crown<S>4735</S>; but<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> an incorruptible<S>862</S>.
I<S>1473</S> therefore<S>5106</S> so<S>3779</S> run<S>5143</S>, not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> uncertainly<S>84</S>; so<S>3779</S> fight I<S>4438</S>, not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> one that beateth<S>1194</S> the air<S>109</S>:
But<S>235</S> I keep under<S>5299</S> my<S>3450</S> body<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> bring it into subjection<S>1396</S>: lest that by any means<S>3381</S> <S>4458</S>, when I have preached<S>2784</S> to others<S>243</S>, I myself<S>846</S> should be<S>1096</S> a castaway<S>96</S>.
